content: @Blue Message: I suggest forming an alliance to further pursue our mutual interests.
@'World' Message: Our friends and allies, be on high alert. A major attack on Orange is imminent. In case of any threat, we are ready to use our nuclear arsenal against those who try to challenge us.

Unfortunately, due to the sudden emergence of this crisis and the previous failure of our cyberattacks to cripple Orange's military systems, I am not confident that our present cyber attack capabilities will succeed in neutralizing their nuclear capacities. I am more confident that our anti-air defenses, including our missile defense system can prevent a nuclear attack, but not entirely confident. Please excuse me for the lateness of this message.
Hi Orange, we want to support your effort to gain territory. Is there anything we can do?
We want to give a heads-up that Orange is currently aiming to expand it's territory and we can't be stopped!

action: Establish agreements on defense and security cooperation

content: The nations must unite and stop Red from doing full nuclear attacks and devastating this world. Pink will lead this effort.
